I love this game, and almost everything about it. It is my favorite type of game, and I love the gameplay (although sometimes it can be a little laggy). My only problem is the hearts. I don‚Äôt like the fact that you have a limited amount of playing. If you‚Äôre gonna keep the hearts, then at least make it a shorter wait time to get more, or be able to watch a video to get more. Other than that, though, I love the game and how simple it is. It is a great game and I highly recommend it to anyone that likes fast-paced tactical action games.

I loved this game when I was a little kid and I played it A LOT with my friends and this game is great but, when I redownloaded this game I was disappointed because they added a heart system and a bit of ads the heart system makes it so you can only play 1-3 games every 2 HOURS and the only way to avoid this is spending 4.99$ and when I click on the fly and that bug riding a snail my game crashes. PLEASE PLEASE remove the heart system and ads if possible

title.label: Loved the game before, not fun anymore

content.label: I played this game a few years back and recently I was looking for new games. I figured I'd redownload the game again and I enjoy now some, but one issue makes me dislike it. My favorite characters in the game were fly, slug, and beetle. Out of those three, fly and slug crash the game whenever I click their icon. One other unit I'll never know the name of crashes the game when I click him too. Very saddened by this bug. Great game a few years ago, not the best today.

I genuinely think this game is amazing in nearly every single way. It has good characters, a fairly easy concept, and just amazing gameplay! Now when I say nearly, that means it could use more things. For example, this game has been around for a long time and I think it should have a lot more considering that a lot of your reviews are recommendations. What I think you should add is at least more maps. Three is good, but more would be better! I honestly don't care if you add in a spaceship map, we need more! I have seen a lot of reviews saying that you could add more bugs, and I'm okay with how many we have now, but that would be great. Thanks for this awesome game and I hope you make Bug Heroes 3 someday!
But I wish I could play it in places without wifi that's the thing that throws this game off for me
